attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

Manufacturing is so important to the Uk.
Please don't neglect this fine company who could have a excellent future, protecting jobs and helping the environment with the launch of  electric vans , up to 5000 jobs will be protected .

please reconsider helping LDV vans .

David K Finn Stoke-On-Trent

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
